content:
There are many photographers who specialize in photographing luxury homes and interiors, and who may have a similar aesthetic to Jose Villa's work. Here are some suggestions:

1. Gray Malin - known for his bright, colorful and whimsical photographs of interiors, landscapes, and beach scenes.
2. Eric Piasecki - a New York-based photographer who has worked for major publications and luxury brands, and has a style that is both elegant and timeless.
3. James Merrell - a UK-based photographer who has shot for high-end home decor and design magazines, and has a signature style that is natural, unpretentious and inviting.
4. Simon Upton - an Australian photographer who has worked for prestigious publications and luxury brands, and has a sophisticated and polished style that showcases the beauty of his subjects.
5. William Waldron - a New York-based photographer who has shot for high-end interiors and design magazines, and has a classic yet modern style that emphasizes light, composition, and color.

Of course, photography is a highly subjective field, so it's always best to look at each photographer's portfolio and see if their style resonates with you and your needs.
